Groups.Title: App bars and commands Dom
Groups.Subtitle: AppBar, CommandBar, AppBarButton, AppBarToggleButton, AppBarSeparator
Groups.Description: Use app bars to present navigation, commands, and tools to users.

Groups.Title: Buttons Dom
Groups.Subtitle: Button, HyperlinkButton, RepeatButton, ToggleButton
Groups.Description: Use button controls to let users perform an action, like submitting a form or showing a menu.

Groups.Title: Collection/data controls
Groups.Subtitle: FlipView, GridView, ListView, Pivot, SemanticZoom, Hub
Groups.Description: Use collection controls to display, navigate, and interact with collections of data and media.

Groups.Title: Flyout controls
Groups.Subtitle: ContentDialog, Flyout, MenuFlyout, ToolTip
Groups.Description: Use flyout surfaces to show or collect contextual information.

Groups.Title: Layout controls
Groups.Subtitle: Border, Canvas, Grid, RelativePanel, ScrollViewer, SplitView, StackPanel, VariableSizedWrapGrid, ViewBox
Groups.Description: Use layout controls to arrange the controls and content in your app.

Groups.Title: Progress controls
Groups.Subtitle: ProgressBar, ProgressRing
Groups.Description: Use progress controls to graphically represent ongoing activity or the progress of a task.

Groups.Title: Selection and picker controls
Groups.Subtitle: CheckBox, ComboBox, DatePicker, ListBox, RadioButton, Slider, TimePicker, ToggleSwitch
Groups.Description: Use selection controls to let a user set a value or choose between various options.

Groups.Title: Text controls
Groups.Subtitle: AutoSuggestBox, PasswordBox, RichEditBox, RichTextBlock, TextBlock, TextBox
Groups.Description: Use text controls to display or edit plain text and other rich content.

Groups.Title: Media and ink controls
Groups.Subtitle: Image, InkCanvas, MediaElement
Groups.Description: Use media controls to display images and videos. Use ink to capture strokes and display them.
